articles.author: Dylan Scott
articles.title: America’s leading physician groups are now openly defying RFK Jr. - vox.com
articles.description: The Trump administration has floated restricting Covid vaccines, changing the measles vaccine schedule, and making doctors more vulnerable to vaccine lawsuits. Physician groups are starting to push back.
articles.content: For decades, the American public, the federal government, and the medical community have been nearly unanimous: Vaccines are important because they save lives. Today, after years of escalating attack… [+5097 chars]
